00037 // --------------- //
00038 //     Usage       //
00039 // --------------- //
00040 // Calling
00041 //  put( v )( a )()( c0, c11 );
00042 //
00043 // ----- csv syntax ------
00044 //
00045 // put( v )( a )( T() )( T(c0, c11) );
00046 
00047 namespace boost{
00048 namespace assign{
00049 namespace v2{
00050 namespace put_aux{
00051 
00052         // T = container_type_traits::value<V>::type
00053         template<typename V>
00054     struct crtp_traits
00055     {
00056         typedef typename v2::container_type_traits::value<V>::type value_type;
00057         typedef typename boost::mpl::eval_if<
00058                 container_type_traits::is_ptr_container<V>,
00059             functor_aux::deduce_new_<V>,
00060             functor_aux::deduce_constructor<V>
00061         >::type functor_type;
00062         typedef typename put_aux::deduce_modifier<V>::type modifier_tag;
00063 
00064     };
00065 
00066         // Requirements:
00067     //  d.unwrap()                              returns a reference to V&
00068     //  D d(U v, F const& f);   Constructs an object, d, of type D.
00069     // Usually, f is passed to the crtp. U = V& or V const& depending on need.
00070     // Traits are deprecated but a use may be find in the future.
00071     template<typename V,typename F, typename Tag, typename D, typename Traits>
00072     class crtp :
00073         public put_base,
00074         public  put_aux::expose_fun<F>, // protect + friend?
00075         public  put_aux::expose_modifier<Tag>, // protect + friend?
00076         public functor_aux::crtp_unary_and_up<
00077                 crtp<V, F, Tag, D, Traits>,
00078                 boost::mpl::always< D const& >
00079         >
00080     {
00081 
00082                 public:
00083                 typedef D const& result_type;
00084 
00085                 protected:
00086 
00087         typedef functor_aux::crtp_unary_and_up<
00088             crtp,
00089             boost::mpl::always<result_type>
00090         > super_t;
00091 
00092                 typedef expose_modifier<Tag> expose_modifier_;
00093         typedef typename expose_modifier_::modifier_type modifier_;
00094                 typedef expose_fun<F> expose_fun_;
00095                 
00096         public:
00097         
00098                 D & derived(){ return static_cast<D&>(*this); }
00099                 D const& derived()const{ return static_cast<D const&>(*this); }
00100 
00101                 //public:
00102 
00103                 crtp(){}
00104                 explicit crtp( F const& f ) : expose_fun_( f ){}
00105         explicit crtp( F const& f, modifier_ const& m ) 
00106                 : expose_fun_( f ), expose_modifier_( m ){}
00107 
00108                 using super_t::operator();
00109         result_type operator()()const
00110         {
00111                         return this->arg_deduct( this->fun() );
00112         }
00113 
00114 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_impl(z, N, data) \
00115         template<BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N, typename T)> \
00116     result_type \
00117     impl( BOOST_PP_ENUM_BINARY_PARAMS(N, T, & _) )const \
00118         { \
00119         return this->arg_deduct( this->fun(BOOST_PP_ENUM_PARAMS(N,_)) ); \
00120         } \
00121 
00122 BOOST_PP_REPEAT_FROM_TO(
00123         1,
00124     BOOST_PP_INC(BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_LIMIT_ARITY),
00125     BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_impl,
00126     ~
00127 )
00128 #undef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_impl
00129 
00130                 V& unwrap()const{ return this->derived().unwrap(); } 
00131 
00132                 struct result_of_modulo{
00133 
00134             struct deduce
00135             {
00136                                 typedef functor_aux::deduce_constructor<V> caller_;
00137                         typedef typename caller_::type cons_;
00138                 typedef typename boost::mpl::apply1<
00139                         v2::result_of_modulo::new_fun<D>,
00140                     cons_
00141                 >::type type;
00142             };
00143 
00144         };
00145 
00146                 typename result_of_modulo::deduce::type
00147                 modulo_deduce()const
00148         {
00149                         typedef functor_aux::deduce_constructor<V> caller_;
00150                 typedef typename caller_::type cons_;
00151                 typedef typename result_of_modulo::deduce::type result_;
00152                 return result_(
00153                         this->derived().unwrap(),
00154                 caller_::call()
00155                 );
00156         }
00157 
00158                 protected:
00159 
00160                 template<typename T>
00161         result_type arg_deduct(T* t)const
00162         {
00163                         this->modifier.impl( this->derived().unwrap(), t );
00164             return this->derived();
00165         }
00166 
00167                 template<typename T>
00168         result_type arg_deduct(T& t)const
00169         {
00170                         this->modifier.impl( this->derived().unwrap(), t );
00171             return this->derived();
00172         }
00173 
00174                 template<typename T>
00175         result_type arg_deduct(T const& t)const
00176         {
00177                         this->modifier.impl( this->derived().unwrap(), t );
00178             return this->derived();
00179         }
00180     };
00181 
00182 }// put_aux
00183 }// v2
00184 }// assign
00185 }// boost
